definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Your Medoc, sir. May I serve it now?
sentences.chinese: 先生，您要的麥道克葡萄酒，此刻可以斟酒了嗎？

sentences.english: Madoff made it seem impossibly difficult to invest with him.
sentences.chinese: 麥道夫令他的騙局看起來極困難入局。

sentences.english: Here, Madoff made his most audacious innovation.
sentences.chinese: 在這一點上，麥道夫創造了他最膽大妄爲的發明。

sentences.english: Madoff has not taken any steps that might rehabilitate her image.
sentences.chinese: 她說，麥道夫太太並沒有努力恢復自己的形象。

sentences.english: Standing in front of the judge, Madoff appeared remorseful.
sentences.chinese: 站在法官面前時，麥道夫表現出了悔意。
麥道克斯家的那哥倆兒。

sentences.english: The U.S. attorney is handling the continuing criminal probe of the Madoff fraud.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦檢察官正在處理的麥道夫欺詐案的後續犯罪調查。

sentences.english: Madoff’s fall hit Palm Beach like a hurricane.
sentences.chinese: 麥道夫的垮臺像颶風一樣襲擊了棕櫚灘。

sentences.english: There had been no letters submitted in support of Madoff's character, he said.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一封信被提交上來支持麥道夫的人格，他說。

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to work out who else at Mr Madoff's firm might have had a hand in the affair.
sentences.chinese: 調查者仍在努力查證麥道夫的公司中的其他涉案者。

sentences.english: What marks Mr Madoff's case out, however, is the calibre of investor he suckered .
sentences.chinese: 麥道夫案的顯著之處在於他吸納的高品質投資者。

sentences.english: Xi'an Jiaotong University named a McDonnell International Scholars Academy partner institution.
sentences.chinese: 西安交通大學是麥道國際學者研究院合作伙伴大學。

sentences.english: Most of the Madoffs' clothing will be auctioned another time.
sentences.chinese: 麥道夫的大部分衣物將另行拍賣。

sentences.english: Before the scandal, Mrs. Madoff radiated an understated sense of taste.
sentences.chinese: 醜聞之前，麥道夫太太表現出不俗的品味。
